message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer, but I'm afraid $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $180. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I am still unable to go above $100 for the product. Would it be possible for us to reach an agreement at this price?
